message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1200000 to you, and my proposal aims to strike a fair balance between our interests. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for $1150000. This price reflects its true worth while allowing me to earn a reasonable profit. I believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both parties involved, ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
